      • isFileBinaryEqual

        public static boolean isFileBinaryEqual(java.lang.String file1,
                        java.lang.String file2)
        Compare binary files. Both files must be files (not directories) and exist.
        Parameters:
        file1 - - first file
        file2 - - second file
        Returns:
        boolean - true if files are binary equal
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - error in function
